title._content: Image taken from page 106 of 'The Traveller's Guide to Madeira and the West Indies. Being a hieroglyphic representation of appearances and incidents during a voyage out and homewards. ... With a treatise explanatory of the various figures, etc'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Traveller's Guide to Madeira and the West Indies.
